name: Scootles
description:
Made for Lundum Dare 49 Jam.

The workshop said your scooter has an unstable throttle and should not be used. What do those young whippersnappers know about anything?!! Back in our day we scootered 50 miles to school one-way!!! We survived the war gosh-darn it (well our parents not us).  

We need to do our shopping and with our old age we are not sprinting round the shops no more. We’re taking the scooter gosh darn it and we will complete our shopping and about time too as we are out of alcohol.  

Let’s try not to hit anyone though as we do not want to pay their insurance costs. Also, any damage to the store will have to be covered. So, get in there and get our shopping. And pronto!! I need to crack open a nice cold one.

Controls:

Movement – W, A, S, D (Well until the throttle sticks)

Tab – Open shopping list (Menu – lets you return to main menu, shows score)

'Reverse' levels means reserved scoring  so try to damage as much as possible. Therefore, if you want to smash into everything to get stars then run the 'Reverse' levels.

Credits

Programming, level design / lighting and general Unity Expert - Tom 'Tommo120' Fox

Programming, level design, and sound effects / music - Matt 'Mista Giggles' Shepherd

Programming, level design and 3D 'Art' - Ian 'Surfa' Beecraft

Some Kenny assets and free asset store assets used as we realized we didn't have time to model everything ourselves and get the features we wanted in.

Linux

Requires Mono runtime to run on Linux. Make sure the file is marked as an excecutable. Tested on POPOS! - ensure file is marked as an excecutable.
